original_text: He is a friend of wicked people, and people who do evil things. He is a friend of wicked people, and people who do evil things. He is a friend of wicked people,
korean_text: 악한 일을 하는 자들과 한패가 되어 악인과 함께 다니면서

sentences.original_text: He is a friend of wicked people
and people who do evil things
He is a friend of wicked people
and people who do evil things
He is a friend of wicked people
